resources.string:
+ The deck have 7 cards, each card have 3 images.
 + Initially, one card is automatically reveal and place inside the discard pile.
 + The game start by revealing the top card from the draw pile, and at the same time, the timer start.
 + Your mission is in the shortest time possible, find the image that appear on both cards from the draw pile and discard pile.
 + When you found the image, the card that is revealed to you is putted onto the discard pile and the next top card is revealed for you to continue.
 + When there is no remaining card, the timer stop. Top 5 shortest times will be displayed in the high score board.
